pull_request.title: Add BIKE to master and some autotools/Makefiles changes
pull_request.body:
The file “config/.gitkeep” is no longer needed its purpose was to allow git having an empty folder (config).
Moved the file acinclude.m4 to the config directory (together with the other *.m4 files).
Broke configure.ac into sub m4 files to make their reading easier.
Sorted the configure flags list according to an alphabetic order.
Changed USE_* protocol flags to ENABLE_* so all the flags will be consistent
Adjust most of the Makefiles.am files to have consistent compilation flags.
Added some more compilation warnings – and fixed some errors accordingly.
Added .travis/defs.sh - this file holds common definitions that are used by travis’s scripts.
Removed the file NEW_API.md
Converted all symbols to be hidden except for the main KEM/KEX/SIG OQS APIs
